## VM.takePNGScreenshot() method

Takes a screenshot of the virtual machine and returns the corresponding PNG image.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
takePNGScreenshot(): Promise<PNG>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;PNG&gt;
